content: That's a great list, thanks! I'll definitely check out the National Geographic series and The New York Times' climate section. By the way, have you got any recommendations on how to stay organized with my reading list? I feel like I've got a lot of articles and books to get through, and I don't want to fall behind. I've been relying on memory to keep track of what I've read and what I want to read, but I'm not sure if that's the most efficient way.
